sentences.en: In contrast, a recent flurry of bearish reports warn that China's economy could soon implode.
sentences.cn: 与此相反, 最近一系列言辞犀利的文章发出了这样的警告:中国经济可能会很快走向崩溃.

sentences.en: Nuggest implode due to injury or personality.
sentences.cn: 掘金内乱由于伤病或者性格.

sentences.en: Nuggest implode due to injury or personality. Losing Camby would make them mediocre.
sentences.cn: 掘金内乱由于伤病或者性格. 失去坎比会让他们变的平庸.

sentences.en: The windows on both sides of the room had imploded.
sentences.cn: 房间两边的窗户都向内爆碎了。
